## kl list regions

list all regions of selected device

### Synopsis

List regions

This command will help you to see list of all the regions of your selected device. 

Examples:
  # list regions of selected device
  kl list regions


```
kl list regions [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for regions
```
